data.message: So why is it wrong to want a STRAIGHT PRIDE day or month?

replies.message: When have straight people struggled for the right to get married? Oh, that's right, never.
When have two males/females slept together and created a human being? Oh that's right, never!!!!!!

Nadia, I was arguing about the proposal of a "straight pride" parade. You didn't actually argue my point.
As for your point, I must ask if, by your logic, it is wrong for straight elders to get married because they cannot reproduce.

Nadia, you do realise there also are straight people that can't get kids because of something being not alright with their body?
Should they also be banned from getting married?
Or an elder woman? Elderly women can't get pregnant either, are they worthless scum, too?
